Verses.5: All of you, clothe yourselves in humility towards one another, because, "God opposes the proud, but shows favor to the humble."
Verses.6: Therefore humble yourselves under God's mighty hand, that he may exalt you at the proper time.
Verses.7: Cast all your anxiety upon Him, because he cares about you.
Verses.8: Be sober. Be watchful. Your adversary, the devil, prowls around like a roaring lion, looking to devour someone.
Verses.9: Resist him with the strength of faith.

Changes: 2022-08-11 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 5-9(a) based on Greek.

FootNotes.5: Part 'a'is not needed for vespers, it is: You who are younger, submit yourselves to your elders.
FootNotes.9: Only the first portion required for compline.
